title: Since towers can be executed by Ziggs and in general seem even weaker with dragon buffs
body: Can we please get a tower buff somewhere to combat this. {{champion:18}} {{champion:115}} will delete any tower now with no way to effectivly stop them since they both have very long range abilities. Also with dragon buff, and {{item:3060}} {{item:3512}} still being options, I think that towers need to be added to the endangered species list.

replies.body:
Not sure if i missed something but im pretty sure only the new earth dragon gives bonus damage to towers and its not even guaranteed to spawn in an entire game (after 35 it gets replaced by the elder).  If anything it just changed the second dragon buff which shredded towers which you were guaranteed to get at second dragon into buff which could come from any dragon in the first 35 min or not at all.

Just my two cents.
ziggs now executes towers with his satchel
Well this is just one champion, who used to shred towers anyways. And towers actually did get a buff.
Tristana also did. And they were buffed damage wise not defensively, in fact they might have gotten weaker since armor and magic pen is easy to get, and have health lowered by 700.
Have you even read the projected changes? They are adding Armor and MR and pen will work
Yeah I just did. I already made a rant thread about this. On my defense 13 hours ago complete PBE change list wasn't so easily available. You are right, changes are BS.
Tell me about it. I think they did this to end games quicker. But IMO this isn't the right way to do it.

Towers are getting their ramping damage buffed and will keep the ramped damage when switching targets. This will really help prevent early game dives. 

Death timers are also being lowered during the 20-30 minute marks so it will be harder to do a massive push. We'll see what other changes they make as the cycle continues.
